result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Draven Volando Peeples

records.addlTxt: Emailed to Atty Frank and mailed out. MG

10:37 AM Defendant Draven Volando Peeples in court.  Attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Court questions the defendant.  Defendant did not fill out the paperwork again.  Court advises the defendant he needs to fill out the paperwork again today and come back into court.

Recess

10:55am  BACK ON THE RECORD:
Court questions the defendant.  

BY THE COURT:  Court will appoint an Attorney
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing November 1, 2022
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
10:57 AM Defendant Draven Volando Peeples appeared by zoom.  Attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Court questions the defendant regarding paperwork for court appointed Attorney.  Defendant called the COC office on Friday and they didn't receive it yet.  

BY THE COURT:  Reset for in-person
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:47 AM Defendant Draven Volando Peeples appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court questions the defendant regarding a court appointed attorney.  Defendant sent it back in last Wednesday.

BY THE COURT:  Reset so the court can review the paperwork.
bond continued
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:23 AM Defendant Draven Volando Peeples appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Clifford C. Burdon in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant states that he tried to get a Public Defender but he doesn't qualify.  

BY THE COURT:  Clerk to send Court Appointed Attorney form to the defendant.
Court confirms address.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 26, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:48 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Draven Volando Peeples appeared by video. 
Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands and is still looking for an attorney as he does not qualify for PD. 
BY THE COURT:  Reset.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.
*No use or possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription

3:07 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian J. Juech in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Draven Volando Peeples appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Guy Cardamone appears as a special appearance on behalf of the defendant for bond. 
Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint.  Court confirms address and phone. Atty Cardamone states that the defendant does not qualify for Public Defender appointment but will appear today with him. Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands. 
Court finds probable cause for the charges for Riverside purposes. 

Atty Juech requests a $250 cash bond with conditions.
Atty Cardamone makes bail arguments.

BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $250 Cash bond with conditions: 
*No use or possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription
Initial appearance scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Initial appearance on July 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
